This is a great game. With that being said, it takes dedication... [i] hours [/i]spent practicing aim, memorizing spray patterns, and learning map knowledge before you can have much fun. 

If you are new,  I [i] highly [/i] recommend practicing crosshair placement (try always keeping it at head-level and practice peeking corners effectively), and learning the first 5-10 shots of the AK and M4A4/M4A1-S spray patterns (also learn others but these are a good start).
